name: Loli Gate
description:
This game is a patched version of the game we submitted for the Game Jam "Game Pratic' 2018"

============================

Help lolies to grow their army, by collecting museum pieces in order to escape the museum.  Help them changing their path by opening or closing the doors while avoiding the guards and the others obstacles.

============================

You have to guid enough Loli's to the numbered door to open it and access more difficult levels.
